fullText:
Dwindling Strength

Prerequisite: Genasi, firedeath racial power
Benefit: When you use firedeath, you are no longer grabbed and cannot be grabbed until the end of your next turn. In addition, enemies adjacent to you take a -5 penalty to damage rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
